title: VO Updates and Skins
body:
I wanted to ask some Rioter, how hard would it be to add a few skin exclusives VO lines when a champions gets a VGU or VO Update?

First, what is a VO Update? for those who don't know is when a champion is relatively fine in visuals and/or gameplay, so they update they Voice Over because it was lacking.
Two examples of this would be Lux, who got a VO Update when they called her actress to voice the Elementalist skin  (and they used the moment)
And the other would be Maokai who got new voicelines when was the Tank Update.

What do I mean by Skin exclusives VO lines?
For those who play Jinx, Jhin or Taliyah knows that their release skins (Mafia Jinx, High Noon Jhin and Freljord Taliyah) have a few extra lines from their base, this happens because Riot records extra lines when they call the voice Actor/Actress and then uses them in the skins.

Would be nice to get a few lines for every skin (or for a few specific). I'm not saying Legendary VO, but like 2-3 lines.

For example, Evelynn is near her VGU (most likely they already recorded), but imagine if her Tango skin would have a special taunt with Tango TF. Things like that.

What do you think? 
I think this would raise the value of every skin, since every skin would have a bit of unique from all the rest.

replies.body:
Hey Finikksu! There's good news and bad news here...

The good news is, THIS ALREADY HAPPENS!!!! For the Warwick and Urgot VGUs (aka reworks), we added lines to a few of the skins where we felt they'd make the biggest impact. (Hyena Warwick and Battlecast Urgot to be specific.) It wouldn't be too hard to do this during VO updates either, I think there were a few Meowkai lines that were recorded, actually. I don't quite remember why they didn't make it into the game. But if things had worked out, they could have!

Anyway, the bad news is that even when we do things like this many players don't notice. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  So doing a few lines for every skin might be overkill. I love your idea of the Tango Evelynn taunt though, that's a perfect example of a skin where there's a real opportunity to do something awesome. 

Any suggestions for Swain?

I feel like Bilgewater Swain should have special interactions with Gankplank because of the entire stolen ship story and the pirate theme. Maybe Bilgewater Katarina too?

I guess Northern Front could hint at an upcoming Frejlord invasion?(probably a bad idea but still)

Tyrant is the skin I am most enthusiastic about but unfortunately I have no idea how it will be different from the base skin in the new lore. You could always drop a hint :3

He must say to  enemy Quinn " I got the first worm valor"
To enemy Urgot " You don't need human brain to betray you Urgot"

To friendly sion " Bring me a Jarvans head Sion and i promise you a great victory"
To Kata " I respected you'r father katarina, but he was in my way"
To any Demaia Champion " petrisite. Cowards way to defend against magic"

I don't know where you get your statistics from either, but people most DEFINITELY DO NOTICE.

I'm sorry but the Jaximus's "This is for you kid" line is iconic and even people who don't play him know about that voiceline.

On top of that, if some day Soraka could get a special Voiceline for a beautiful Soraka Main who passed (ask KateyKhaos) that would be beautiful.

Also what about the new lines added to Program Camille, Mafia Jinx, Frejlord Taliyah?
They're all super nice touches that make the skins really fun and awesome.
